subject: Review Simsonn on Youtube
description_text:
Hello team

My name is Eze and I have a YouTube channel dedicated to technology:

Zero Hardware (40,000 subscribers):
https://www.youtube.com/@ZeroHardware

 We are from Argentina with audiences in Europe (Spain) and Latin America


We are interested in reviewing some products from your brand, which look
very interesting and our audience will love to see.

Thanks for your time,
Best regards,

Eze
Zero Hardware

conversations.body_text: Hi Zero Hardware,    Thank you for contacting us, but as we do not yet have a warehouse in South America, we are unable to take on a large number of customers. We will contact you in the next phase. Thank you!
